abstract: Major effort in Israel to desalinate Mediterranean Sea water and recycle wastewater has provided country with enough water for all its needs, even during times of drought; endeavor follows severe seven-year drought that began in 2005.
lead_paragraph: A major national effort to desalinate Mediterranean seawater and to recycle wastewater has provided the country with enough water for all its needs.

headline.main: Aided by the Sea, Israel Overcomes an Old Foe: Drought
headline.print_headline: Aided by Sea, Israel Defeats Old Foe: Drought

snippet: A major national effort to desalinate Mediterranean seawater and to recycle wastewater has provided the country with enough water for all its needs.
